title: Surebonder H-195F Specialty Series 20 Watt Mini Size High Temperature Detail Hot Glue Gun
description: The Surebonder H-195F Mini Glue Gun is a perfect addition to your craft supplies and has an extended tip for accurate detailed work. The use of high temperature creates a better bond with paper, fabric, wood, plastic, metal, ceramics and more. The 20-watt glue gun features a lighted power light, insulated nozzle, detachable auxiliary stand and a safety fuse for enhanced protection. Uses high or dual temperature glue sticks, 5/16-inch in diameter by 4 or 10-inch length.
